languages.text: "Сколько их уцелевших собратьев еще бродит во мраке средь звезд?.. Кораблям Человечества нужно опасаться возмездия тех, кто отчаялся выжить".
"How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."
languages.original_text: "Сколько их уцелевших собратьев еще бродит во мраке средь звезд?.. Кораблям Человечества нужно опасаться возмездия тех, кто отчаялся выжить".

traits.locale_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

traits.locale_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “他们还有多少幸存的族人在群星间的黑暗中游荡？人类的舰船应该担心，那些拼命求生的异形恐怕会进行报复。”
languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

traits.locale_text: “他们还有多少幸存的族人在群星间的黑暗中游荡？人类的舰船应该担心，那些拼命求生的异形恐怕会进行报复。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Certes, mais combien des leurs rôdent encore dans les ténèbres entre les étoiles ? Les vaisseaux de l'humanité devraient craindre les représailles de ceux qui sont prêts à tout pour survivre. »
languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

traits.locale_text: « Certes, mais combien des leurs rôdent encore dans les ténèbres entre les étoiles ? Les vaisseaux de l'humanité devraient craindre les représailles de ceux qui sont prêts à tout pour survivre. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cuántos de sus hermanos supervivientes acechan aún en la oscuridad entre las estrellas? Las naves de la Humanidad deberían temer el contraataque de los supervivientes desesperados».
languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuántos de sus hermanos supervivientes acechan aún en la oscuridad entre las estrellas? Las naves de la Humanidad deberían temer el contraataque de los supervivientes desesperados».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らの生き残りのうち、星の間の闇を彷徨うキンはまだ何人いるのでしょう？人類の船は、生き残るために必死になっている者たちの報復を恐れるべきです。」
languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの生き残りのうち、星の間の闇を彷徨うキンはまだ何人いるのでしょう？人類の船は、生き残るために必死になっている者たちの報復を恐れるべきです。」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie viele ihrer überlebenden Verwandten streifen noch durch die Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen? Die Schiffe der Menschheit sollten ihre Rache fürchten, denn sie würden alles tun, um zu überleben."
languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

traits.locale_text: "Wie viele ihrer überlebenden Verwandten streifen noch durch die Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen? Die Schiffe der Menschheit sollten ihre Rache fürchten, denn sie würden alles tun, um zu überleben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."

languages.text: "Sağ kalan soydaşlarından kaç tanesi hâlâ yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıkta geziniyor? İnsanlığın gemileri, sağ kalmaya çalışan çaresizlerin yapacağı misillemelerden korkmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "How many of their surviving kin still roam the darkness between the stars? Humanity's ships should fear the retaliation of those desperate to survive."
